scripts.build: sh -c 'for f in scripts/build/**/*.ts; do bun run "$f"; done && for f in scripts/build/*.sh; do bash "$f"; done'
scripts.lint: bun audit && bunx eslint 'src/**/*.ts' --max-warnings=0 && bunx stylelint 'src/css/**/*.css' && bunx htmlhint 'public/**/*.html' && bunx prettier --check './**/*.{ts,css,html,json}' && bunx madge --circular --extensions ts ./src/ts && bunx tsc --noEmit
scripts.prettify: bunx prettier --write . && bunx eslint src/**/*.ts --fix && bunx stylelint src/css/ --fix
